A Sidenav component that can be opened and closed programatically.

By default, upon opening it will slide out on top of the main content area.

Usage

Left Nav! Center Content Open Left Menu Right Nav!
var app = angular.module('myApp', ['ngMaterial']); app.controller('MyController', function($scope, $mdSidenav) { $scope.openLeftMenu = function() { $mdSidenav('left').toggle(); }; });

Attributes

Parameter
Type
Description
md-is-open expression
(optional)
expression

A model bound to whether the sidenav is opened.
md-component-id string
(optional)
string

componentId to use with $mdSidenav service.
md-is-locked-open expression
(optional)
expression

When this expression evalutes to true, the sidenav 'locks open': it falls into the content's flow instead of appearing over it. This overrides the is-open attribute.

The $mdMedia() service is exposed to the is-locked-open attribute, which can be given a media query or one of the sm, gt-sm, md, gt-md, lg or gt-lg presets. Examples:

  • <md-sidenav md-is-locked-open="shouldLockOpen"></md-sidenav>
  • <md-sidenav md-is-locked-open="$mdMedia('min-width: 1000px')"></md-sidenav>
  • <md-sidenav md-is-locked-open="$mdMedia('sm')"></md-sidenav> (locks open on small screens)
